product_name: SkirtSports Super Girl Bike Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Ride your bike to the park, score some rounds of beach volleyball, and stop for an iced latte on the way home. You'll feel your best in the Super Girl Bike Tank Top from SkirtSports. Polyester/spandex jersey stretches, wicks moisture and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Internal shelf bra with removable pads offers high-impact support for A-B cups and medium-impact support for C-D cups. Formfitting Super Girl Bike Tank Top from SkirtSports has 3 open-top back pockets for energy snacks and other essentials. Reflective logos aid visibility in low light.
short_description: Ride your bike to the park, score some rounds of beach volleyball, and stop for an iced latte on the way home. You'll feel your best in the Super Girl Bike Tank Top from SkirtSports.
